original_title: The Many Sad Fates of Mr. Toledano
overview: Photographer Phil Toledano has become obsessed with his future. Using DNA tests, fortune tellers, and a prosthetic makeup artist, he begins photographing the many dark possibilities that might await him -- despite his wife's pleas to abandon the project. Over three years, Toledano's obsession alters him and his family forever.
title: The Many Sad Fates of Mr. Toledano
